evidence_pieces.name: Poisoned Coffee Cup
evidence_pieces.description: Miranda's coffee cup with traces of digitalis poison
evidence_pieces.proves: Someone with access to her workspace planted evidence

evidence_pieces.name: Coffee Machine Residue
evidence_pieces.description: Digitalis traces found in coffee machine's water reservoir
evidence_pieces.proves: Poison was added to the machine, not individual cups

evidence_pieces.name: Fake Vendor Invoices
evidence_pieces.description: 200+ invoices from non-existent companies over 5 years
evidence_pieces.proves: Leonard has been embezzling through phantom vendor scheme

evidence_pieces.name: Blackwood's Audit Notes
evidence_pieces.description: Detailed investigation showing Leonard's embezzlement patterns
evidence_pieces.proves: Blackwood was helping Miranda expose Leonard's crimes

evidence_pieces.name: Fabricated Client Meeting
evidence_pieces.description: Leonard's alleged client never received scheduled call
evidence_pieces.proves: Leonard's alibi is false - he was in the office during murder

evidence_pieces.name: Digitalis Source
evidence_pieces.description: Foxglove plant cultivation equipment and extraction notes
evidence_pieces.proves: Leonard had access to the murder weapon

evidence_pieces.name: Security Badge Logs
evidence_pieces.description: Leonard's keycard accessed Miranda's workspace after hours
evidence_pieces.proves: Leonard planted evidence in Miranda's area

evidence_chain_logic.step_1: Coffee Machine Residue proves poison was added to machine, not individual cups
evidence_chain_logic.step_2: Poisoned Coffee Cup in Miranda's possession was planted evidence
evidence_chain_logic.step_3: Security Badge Logs prove Leonard had access to plant evidence
evidence_chain_logic.step_4: Fake Vendor Invoices reveal Leonard's 5-year embezzlement scheme
evidence_chain_logic.step_5: Blackwood's Audit Notes show victim was helping Miranda expose Leonard
evidence_chain_logic.step_6: Fabricated Client Meeting proves Leonard's alibi is false
evidence_chain_logic.step_7: Digitalis Source proves Leonard had means to commit murder
evidence_chain_logic.conclusion: Leonard killed Blackwood to prevent exposure of embezzlement, then framed Miranda

how_client_was_framed.motive_fabrication: Leonard spread rumors about Miranda's disciplinary issues to create apparent motive
how_client_was_framed.evidence_planting: Used security access to place poisoned coffee cup in Miranda's workspace
how_client_was_framed.timing_manipulation: Arranged for Miranda to find victim first, making her prime suspect
how_client_was_framed.narrative_control: As senior partner, Leonard shaped initial investigation narrative
how_client_was_framed.why_miranda_targeted: She was junior employee investigating discrepancies that threatened Leonard's scheme
